item.title: From A - Z: The complex world of text mining
item.description: What is the first thing a baby has to learn? It’s Lanuage. Grammar, Vocabulary, Dialekts. Children seem to learn in very easily. So why is it so hard to do for a computer? Let’s dive into the world of text analytics!

item.title: How to capture images
item.description: This post is a based on a dissertaton concerning the analytics of images though machine learning algorithms.
